attributes.effect: Prevents people above or below a certain age from access to a target
attributes.name: Age Line

attributes.effect: Cleared target's airway by vanishing blockages
attributes.name: Anapneo

attributes.effect: Used as part of the ritual to become an Animagus
attributes.hand: Place wand tip over caster's heart
attributes.incantation: Amato Animo Animato Animagus(ah-MAH-toh ah-NEE-moh ah-nee-MAH-toh an-ah-MAY-jus)
attributes.name: Animagus Spell

attributes.hand: Point wand at target (when animating individual target), Hold wand aloft or wave (when animating multiple things)
attributes.name: Animation Charm

attributes.effect: Prevented Disapparition within a certain area
attributes.name: Anti-Disapparition Jinx

attributes.effect: Conjures a shooting arrow from the caster's wand
attributes.name: Arrow Shooting Spell

attributes.effect: Turns target human into a badger
attributes.name: Badgering

attributes.creator: Miranda Goshawk(mid-20th century)
attributes.effect: Transforms target's bogeys into bats that fly out of the victim's nose
attributes.name: Bat-Bogey Hex

attributes.effect: Bewitches snowballs to follow and harass a designated target
attributes.name: Bewitched Snowballs

attributes.effect: Turned a Boggart into something amusing
attributes.name: Boggart-Banishing Spell

attributes.effect: Makes a broomstick attempt to buck its rider off
attributes.name: Broom jinx

attributes.effect: Created a stream of non-bursting bubbles
attributes.name: Bubble Spell

attributes.effect: Sets off a high-pitched shriek if entered
attributes.name: Caterwauling Charm

attributes.effect: Transforms a cauldron into a badger
attributes.name: Cauldron to badger

attributes.effect: Turns a cauldron into a sieve
attributes.name: Cauldron to Sieve

attributes.effect: Assists the caster in cheating on written papers
attributes.name: Cribbing Spell

attributes.effect: Excruciating pain, insanity if victim was subjected for too long
attributes.name: Cruciatus Curse

attributes.effect: Nasty cold and an extremely runny nose
attributes.name: Curse of the Bogies

attributes.creator: Elliot Smethwyck (1820)
attributes.effect: Places a cushioning effect on an object
attributes.name: Cushioning Charm

attributes.creator: Severus Snape
attributes.effect: Suspends people by the ankles in the air
attributes.name: Dangling Jinx

attributes.effect: Blew up and disintegrated the target
attributes.name: Disintegration spell

attributes.effect: Dried up small bodies of water
attributes.name: Drought Charm

attributes.effect: Caused boils to spell 'SNEAK' on the face of a traitor
attributes.name: Dumbledore's Army parchment jinx

attributes.effect: Makes opponent stumble, Causes sharp pain
attributes.name: Everte Statum

attributes.creator: Mnemone Radford c. 1900s (possibly)
attributes.effect: Implanted a false memory in the victim's mind
attributes.name: False memory spell

attributes.effect: Causes objects to burn on contact
attributes.name: Flagrante Curse

attributes.creator: Badeea Ali and Ben Copper
attributes.effect: Knocks the target back with greater force than the Knockback Jinx
attributes.name: Flipendo Maxima

attributes.effect: Stops movement and actions of the target
attributes.name: Freezing Charm

attributes.effect: Causes fur to grow on someone
attributes.name: Fur spell

attributes.effect: Caused hair to grow longer and thicker
attributes.name: Hair-Thickening Charm

attributes.effect: Offensive spells that caused damage; would follow their target
attributes.name: Homing spell

attributes.effect: When cast onto a map, it enabled tracking the movements of every person in the mapped area
attributes.name: Homonculous Charm

attributes.effect: May temporarily change a transformed werewolf back into their human form (according to Gilderoy Lockhart, it cures lycanthropy)
attributes.name: Homorphus Charm

attributes.creator: Herpo the Foul (possibly)
attributes.effect: Prepared a receptacle to become a Horcrux
attributes.name: Horcrux-making spell

attributes.effect: Transforms target's tongue into a horn
attributes.name: Horn tongue hex

attributes.creator: Basil Horton and Randolph Keitch (c. 1929)
attributes.effect: Allow broomsticks to brake more easily
attributes.name: Horton-Keitch Braking Charm

attributes.effect: Causes a broomstick to attempt to hurl its rider off
attributes.name: Hurling Hex

attributes.effect: Alters the design of a room
attributes.name: Inanimatus Conjurus Spell

attributes.effect: Gives target insectoid qualities for a short period of time
attributes.name: Insect Hex

attributes.effect: Detects intruders and sounds an alarm
attributes.name: Intruder Charm

attributes.light: Blue, orange, yellow red, purple or white
attributes.name: Knockback Jinx

attributes.creator: Severus Snape
attributes.effect: Stuck tongue to roof of the mouth
attributes.name: Langlock

attributes.effect: Let caster see into the mind of another person
attributes.name: Legilimency Spell

attributes.creator: Severus Snape
attributes.light: Flash of light of unknown colour
attributes.name: Liberacorpus

attributes.creator: Possibly Levina Monkstanley (between 1772 and 1993)
attributes.effect: Focused beam of light from end of wand
attributes.hand: Slide wand across ground and point
attributes.name: Lumos Duo

attributes.effect: Produced very bright light from wand tip
attributes.name: Lumos Maxima

attributes.effect: Caused weather effects caused by incantations to cease
attributes.name: Meteolojinx Recanto

attributes.effect: Produced special fog for the concealment of certain locations
attributes.name: Ministry of Magic Fog

attributes.effect: Revealed secret passages, particularly the One-Eyed Witch Passage
attributes.name: One-Eyed Witch Spell

attributes.effect: Sucks the target into the ground
attributes.name: Orbis

attributes.creator: Isidora Morganach
attributes.effect: Removed pain from the target, Could empower those who absorbed it
attributes.name: Pain extraction spell

attributes.effect: Created protective black fire that only burnt the caster's enemies whilst leaving their allies unharmed
attributes.name: Protego Diabolica

attributes.effect: Caused yellowish pus to squirt from one's nose
attributes.name: Pus Squirting Hex

attributes.effect: Reverses the effects of an incomplete Transformation spell
attributes.name: Reparifarge

attributes.effect: Repels enemies; if used with Protego Maxima and Fianto Duri, it disintegrates anything that comes in contact with the barrier
attributes.name: Repello Inimicum

attributes.effect: Revealed secrets about a person or object
attributes.name: Revelio Charm

attributes.effect: Showed the previous spells cast by a wand
attributes.hand: Hold tip of wand to targeted wand
attributes.name: Reverse Spell

attributes.effect: Returns objects to their original positions or states
attributes.name: Reverte

attributes.effect: Accelerates the growth of a rosebush
attributes.name: Rose Growth

attributes.effect: Causes a rowboat to propel itself
attributes.hand: Tap twice on boat with wand
attributes.name: Rowboat spell

attributes.hand: Downwards, palm of opposite hand held outward
attributes.name: Salvio hexia

attributes.effect: Makes tiny spikes erupt all over the victim
attributes.name: Sea Urchin Jinx

attributes.effect: Pulled something towards the caster or vice versa
attributes.name: Seize and pull charm

attributes.effect: Reflected spells and blocked physical forces
attributes.light: Invisible on its own, reflected light of spell
attributes.name: Shield Charm

attributes.effect: Used to break down magical shields
attributes.hand: Point wand to the place where the spell is desired to hit
attributes.name: Shield penetration spell

attributes.effect: Cleans ectoplasm, Frightens ghosts and other spirits
attributes.name: Skurge Charm

attributes.effect: Explosive, destroyed everything in its range
attributes.name: Smashing Spell

attributes.effect: Emitted a magnified roar from the tip of the wand
attributes.name: Sonorous Charm

attributes.effect: Revealed spells cast on objects or potions
attributes.name: Specialis Revelio

attributes.effect: Causes the target's legs to become spongy
attributes.name: Sponge-Knees Curse

attributes.effect: When a word was spoken, the caster was alerted and protective enchantments around the speaker were weakened
attributes.name: Taboo

attributes.effect: Transforms a teacup into a tortoise
attributes.name: Teacup to tortoise

attributes.effect: Transforms a teapot into a tortoise
attributes.name: Teapot to tortoise

attributes.creator: Severus Snape
attributes.effect: Causes its victim's toenails to grow alarmingly fast
attributes.name: Toenail-growing hex

attributes.effect: Revealed traces of magic, including footprints and track marks
attributes.name: Tracking spell

attributes.effect: Tortured, possibly by transfiguring the target to death
attributes.name: Transmogrifian Torture

attributes.effect: Magical vow, that was fatal if broken
attributes.name: Unbreakable Vow

attributes.creator: Ancient African sorcerer (possibly); first brought to Britain by Eldon Elsrickle in the early 1600s
attributes.name: Unlocking Charm

attributes.creator: Lord Voldemort
attributes.effect: Allowed a witch or wizard to fly unaided
attributes.name: Unsupported flight

attributes.effect: Cleans an object like a vacuum cleaner
attributes.name: Vacuum cleaner spell

attributes.effect: Creates a stronger jet of wind compared to Ventus
attributes.name: Ventus Duo

attributes.effect: Caused the wand tip to burn like a sparkler whilst damaging an opponent
attributes.name: Verdillious

attributes.effect: Do damage to opponents, Reveal hidden things
attributes.name: Verdimillious Charm

attributes.effect: Do damage to an opponent, Reveal hidden objects
attributes.name: Verdimillious Duo Spell
